survey_name: EV Charging Station User Experience Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of electric vehicle (EV) charging stations to improve service quality, accessibility, and overall user experience.

questions.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to ensure clarity.

script.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: What types of EV charging stations do you typically use? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select responses. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with an open-text option for 'Other'

script.question_text: What types of EV charging stations do you typically use? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when selecting an EV charging station? (Rank in order of importance, with 1 being most important)
questions.routing_logic: Show if Q1 answer is not 'This is my first time'
questions.client_notes: Use a ranking question type where respondents can drag and drop options. Ensure mobile-friendly design.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: ranking (SINGLE_CHOICE for each rank; backend logic required to capture order)

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when selecting an EV charging station? (Rank in order of importance, with 1 being most important)
script.routing_logic: Show if Q1 answer is not 'This is my first time'

questions.question_text: Please describe any challenges or frustrations you have encountered while using public EV charging stations.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: Please describe any challenges or frustrations you have encountered while using public EV charging stations.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current availability of EV charging stations in your area?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Include a 'Not applicable' option if needed.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current availability of EV charging stations in your area?
